json_to_edit.voice_over: The keys moved on their own, revealing secrets yet to unfold.
json_to_edit.description: Emily discovers a haunted typewriter that predicts future events.
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with a single desk lamp
json_to_edit.name: Prophetic Typewriter
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Emily encounters a haunted typewriter that writes future events.

qa.action: Emily enters the attic, lightning illuminating the cluttered space.

hf.action: Emily approaches an old desk with a mysterious typewriter.

tr.action: The typewriter's keys begin to move on their own.

xc.action: Emily jumps back in shock as the typewriter continues typing.

ka.action: The typed message reveals a future event.

fn.action: Emily reads the message with a mix of fear and fascination.

af.action: Emily sits at the desk, contemplating the implications of her discovery.

edit_command: Add a new shot after each existing shot, but don't change anything else in the scene.

qa.action: Emily enters the attic, lightning illuminating the cluttered space.

bx.action: Camera pans across the attic, revealing old furniture and mysterious objects.

hf.action: Emily approaches an old desk with a mysterious typewriter.

yz.action: Emily's hand hovers over the typewriter, hesitating to touch it.

tr.action: The typewriter's keys begin to move on their own.

lm.action: Individual keys press down, forming words on the blank page.

xc.action: Emily jumps back in shock as the typewriter continues typing.

op.action: From behind Emily, we see the typewriter furiously typing out its message.

ka.action: The typed message reveals a future event.

qr.action: Emily's eyes widen as she reads the specific details of the prediction.

fn.action: Emily reads the message with a mix of fear and fascination.

st.action: Tears form in Emily's eyes as she grapples with the weight of this discovery.

af.action: Emily sits at the desk, contemplating the implications of her discovery.

uv.action: Camera slowly moves away from Emily, showing her small figure amidst the vast, shadowy attic.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot after each existing shot in the scene, effectively doubling the number of shots from 7 to 14. this will require updating the "number_of_shots" field, adding new shots to the "shots" dictionary, and updating the "list_display_order" to include the new shots. we'll create new shots that complement and expand on the existing ones, maintaining the atmosphere and progression of the scene. the new shots will be creative and fitting for the scene's context, adding depth to the storytelling without changing the core elements of the original scene.
